scripts.docker:build: docker build -f docker/Dockerfile.app -t atm-app . && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile.preprocessor -t atm-preprocessor .
scripts.docker:generate: mkdir -p data/docker && docker run --rm --name atm-preprocessor-generate --env-file .env -v $(pwd)/data/docker:/app/data:rw atm-preprocessor
scripts.docker:down: docker stop atm-app atm-preprocessor atm-preprocessor-generate || true && docker rm atm-app atm-preprocessor atm-preprocessor-generate || true
scripts.docker:kill-generation: docker kill atm-preprocessor-generate || true && docker rm atm-preprocessor-generate || true
scripts.docker:logs: docker logs -f atm-app & docker logs -f atm-preprocessor
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:restart:app: docker restart atm-app || echo 'App container not running'
scripts.docker:regenerate: bun run docker:generate && bun run docker:restart:app
